nodes.text: Future of Honoghr was the term used by the Noghri to describe the hidden canyon in which they began growing all manner of plants during the early years of the New Republic. After decades of living with the mutated kholm-grass created by the Galactic Empire, Leia Organa Solo proved to the Noghri that the Empire's grasp on them was only through fear. Until the death of Grand Admiral Thrawn, however, the Noghri were forced to hide their growing crops so as not to be massacred again.
